rooms.description: A robust entrance area with exposed concrete finishes that lead to the central courtyard and main living areas.
Open-plan space combining kitchen and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering natural light, built in a Brutalist style.
Private bedroom space adjoining the living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation; designed in a minimalist Brutalist style.
Functional bathroom space integrated into the studio design, featuring raw concrete finishes and minimalistic fixtures.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample daylight to the living area
Entrance door to the studio apartment, with heavy concrete framing in line with Brutalist design
